plot: This film shows various industries and customs in this land of the Far East. Natives are seen smoking their peculiar pipes, deftly making canvas sacks, caning chairs and fashioning brooms. ...
title: Smyrne vécue et pittoresque
plot_es: This film shows various industries and customs in this land of the Far East. Natives are seen smoking their peculiar pipes, deftly making canvas sacks, caning chairs and fashioning brooms. ...
